entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming east 20 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
